Key Match Events: Asnawi Mangkualam scored the only goal from a penalty kick in the 42nd minute.
Vietnam defender Le Pham Thanh Long received a red card after two yellow cards.
Indonesia goalkeeper Hernando Arri was named Player of the Match for his impressive performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Indonesia's win revives their chances of qualifying to the round of 16 with a win against Japan next.
Vietnam suffered a second consecutive loss and will face Iraq in their final group stage match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match saw a penalty decision awarded due to a Vietnamese defensive error.
Vietnam pushed hard in the second half but couldn't equalize with Indonesia.
